page.title: 06MY DAY..MICHAEL BLACK AGED 9
page.content: I useually get up around 7 am. Sometimees I go out on the farm to help dad. We have breakfast before 8 am.,then we go to the end of the farm road to catch the school mini-bus for Letham Primary school.Another 9 pupils use the bus too. The school day starts at 9 am. We have 2 teachers,35 pupils and visiting teachers of art,drama,P.E. and music every fortnight. I am the only pupil in p5 and so I work with one in p6 who is doing the same as I am. In a typical day we do some maths,spelling,hand writing, language and reading. We also visit Cupar swimming pool and Mellville House School gym.School ends at 3pm. and I play outside or help my dad again.I go to cubs,tennis and rugby in Cupar.There are no children of my age living in Collessie.
